thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 48 of 637
thread.title: Amanda Kuhlemeier

author: Amanda Kuhlemeier
title: Amanda Kuhlemeier
text:
I can't say enough positive things about Fabletics. I was skeptical when I joined. I thought for sure I'd forget to skip months. I wasn't sure what to expect with the quality.
It's virtually impossible to forget to skip a month if you want to. They remind you several times. The quality of absolutely everything I've received has been amazing. I receive compliments on my workout gear ALL THE TIME!! I mean ALL THE TIME!!
